message.entry: The generator polynomial parameter must be of even degree.
The initial states parameter must be a scalar or a vector of length equal to the degree of the generator polynomial parameter.
The initial states parameter must have its last value to be nonzero.
The shift parameter must be an integer scalar.
The sequence indexes parameter must be integer valued.
The sequence indexes parameter must be an integer between -1 and 2^(degree/2)-2.
The first element of the sequence indexes parameter must be an integer between -2 and 2^(degree)-2.
The second element of the sequence indexes parameter must be an integer between -1 and 2^(degree/2)-2.
The sequence indexes parameter must be a 2-element vector or a scalar of integer values.
The initial states parameter values must be binary.
